mapper.select: select c.MEM_NO as memNo, m.MEM_NAME as memName, d.DEPT_NAME as deptName, p.POS_NAME as posName, c.COM_INDATE as comIndate, c.COM_OUTDATE as comOutdate, c.COM_STATUS as comStatus from commute c join member m on c.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO join department d on m.DEPT_NO = d.DEPT_NO join position p on m.POS_NO = p.POS_NO
